data.name: DevEncryptionWarningLogger_Message
data.value: DEV ENCRYPTION IS ACTIVE. In-memory key management is being used. Keys are not persisted and will be lost on restart. Do NOT use this configuration in production. Configure a production key management provider using AddEncryption().

data.name: EncryptionConfigurationBuilder_NoProvidersRegistered
data.value: No encryption providers were registered. Call UseInMemoryKeyManagement(), UseKeyManagement<T>(), or UseProvider() to register at least one provider.

data.name: EncryptionConfigurationBuilder_ProviderNotRegistered
data.value: Provider '{0}' was not registered in this builder. Register the provider first.

data.name: EncryptingOutboxStoreDecorator_ReadOnlyMode
data.value: Outbox store is in read-only mode. Writes are not permitted during this encryption migration phase.

data.name: EncryptingInboxStoreDecorator_ReadOnlyMode
data.value: Inbox store is in read-only mode. Writes are not permitted during this encryption migration phase.

data.name: Soc2ReportExporter_CreatedEvidencePackage
data.value: Created evidence package for report {ReportId}: {Size} bytes, {ItemCount} items

data.name: Soc2ReportExporter_CreatingEvidencePackage
data.value: Creating evidence package for report {ReportId} with {EvidenceCount} items

data.name: Soc2ReportExporter_ExcelPlaceholder
data.value: Excel export is a basic Open XML implementation. For production, use ClosedXML or EPPlus for better formatting

data.name: Soc2ReportExporter_PdfPlaceholder
data.value: PDF export is a placeholder. For production, integrate a PDF library like QuestPDF or iTextSharp

data.name: ComplianceMonitoringService_CycleCompleted
data.value: Completed compliance monitoring cycle. Overall level: {Level}, Gaps: {GapCount}

data.name: ComplianceMonitoringService_MonitoringStarting
data.value: Starting continuous compliance monitoring with interval {Interval}

data.name: ComplianceMonitoringService_StatusFetchFailed
data.value: Failed to get compliance status during monitoring cycle

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_GeneratedTypeIReport
data.value: Generated Type I report {ReportId} with opinion {Opinion}

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_GeneratedTypeIIReport
data.value: Generated Type II report {ReportId} with opinion {Opinion}, {ExceptionCount} exceptions

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_GeneratingTypeIReport
data.value: Generating Type I report as of {AsOfDate} for tenant {TenantId}

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_GeneratingTypeIIReport
data.value: Generating Type II report for period {PeriodStart} to {PeriodEnd}, tenant {TenantId}

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_ReportNotStored
data.value: Report {ReportId} generated but not stored - no ISoc2ReportStore configured

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_PeriodEndRequiredForTypeII
data.value: PeriodEnd is required for Type II reports

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_PeriodEndAfterStart
data.value: Period end must be after period start

data.name: Soc2ReportGenerator_TypeIIPeriodTooShort
data.value: Type II report period must be at least {0} days. Provided period is {1:F0} days.

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_AutoFailoverCooldown
data.value: Automatic failover blocked by cooldown. Time remaining: {RemainingSeconds}s

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_AutoFailoverTriggered
data.value: AUTOMATIC FAILOVER TRIGGERED. Primary: {PrimaryRegion} (unhealthy, {Failures} consecutive failures) -> Secondary: {SecondaryRegion}

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_Initialized
data.value: MultiRegionKeyProvider initialized. Primary: {PrimaryRegion}, Secondary: {SecondaryRegion}, Mode: {ReplicationMode}, AutoFailover: {AutoFailover}

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_KeyReplicationCompleted
data.value: Key replication completed. Source: {SourceRegion}, Target: {TargetRegion}, KeyId: {KeyId}

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_ManualFailoverInitiated
data.value: Manual failover initiated. Primary: {PrimaryRegion} -> Secondary: {SecondaryRegion}. Reason: {Reason}

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_RpoThresholdBreached
data.value: RPO threshold breached. Current lag: {LagMinutes:F1} minutes, Target: {TargetMinutes:F1} minutes

data.name: AesGcmEncryptionProvider_KeyStatusNotAllowedForDecryption
data.value: Key status '{0}' does not allow decryption.

data.name: AesGcmEncryptionProvider_KeyStatusNotAllowedForEncryption
data.value: Key status '{0}' does not allow encryption.

data.name: AesGcmEncryptionProvider_NoSuitableKeyFound
data.value: No suitable key found for encryption.

data.name: Encryption_EncryptedDataEnvelopeDeserializeFailed
data.value: Failed to deserialize the encrypted data envelope.

data.name: Encryption_NoPrimaryProviderRegistered
data.value: No primary encryption provider is registered.

data.name: Encryption_NoProviderCanDecrypt
data.value: No provider can decrypt the data.

data.name: Encryption_NoProviderCanDecryptKeyRemoved
data.value: No provider can decrypt the data because the key was removed.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_AtLeastOneShareRequired
data.value: At least one share is required.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_BackupAtRisk
data.value: Backup is at risk: expired or insufficient active shares.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_BackupIntegrityCheckFailed
data.value: Backup integrity check failed: missing key hash or encrypted data.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_CustodianIdsCountMismatch
data.value: Custodian IDs count must match total shares.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_KeyHashVerificationFailedAfterReconstruction
data.value: Key hash verification failed after reconstruction.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_ReconstructionFailed
data.value: Failed to reconstruct key from shares.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_SharesKeyMismatch
data.value: All shares must be from the same key.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_SharesKeyVersionMismatch
data.value: All shares must be from the same key version.

data.name: InMemoryMasterKeyBackupService_TotalSharesTooLow
data.value: Total shares must be at least 2.

data.name: RotatingEncryptionProvider_AlreadyActiveKey
data.value: Data already encrypted with active key, skipping re-encryption

data.name: RotatingEncryptionProvider_KeyAgeExceedsMax
data.value: Key {KeyId} age ({KeyAgeDays:F1} days) exceeds max age ({MaxAgeDays} days), initiating rotation

data.name: RotatingEncryptionProvider_OldKeyVersionReencryptionHint
data.value: Data encrypted with old key version {KeyId} v{Version}, consider re-encryption

data.name: RotatingEncryptionProvider_ReencryptedData
data.value: Re-encrypted data from key {OldKeyId} v{OldVersion} to {NewKeyId} v{NewVersion}

data.name: ShamirSecretSharing_AllSharesMustHaveSameLength
data.value: All shares must have the same length.

data.name: ShamirSecretSharing_AtLeastOneShareRequired
data.value: At least one share is required.

data.name: ShamirSecretSharing_CannotDivideByZero
data.value: Cannot divide by zero in GF(256).

data.name: ShamirSecretSharing_SharesMustHaveAtLeastTwoBytes
data.value: Shares must have at least 2 bytes (index + data).

data.name: ShamirSecretSharing_TotalSharesAtLeastTwo
data.value: Total shares must be at least 2.

data.name: LegalHoldService_HoldSubjectOrTenantRequired
data.value: Either DataSubjectId or TenantId must be specified for a legal hold

data.name: LegalHoldService_ExpiresAtMustBeFuture
data.value: ExpiresAt must be in the future

data.name: ErasureService_CannotCancelRequest
data.value: Erasure request {0} cannot be cancelled. Status: {1}

data.name: ErasureService_CannotGenerateCertificate
data.value: Cannot generate certificate for request {0}. Status: {1}

data.name: ErasureService_TenantIdRequiredForScope
data.value: TenantId is required for Tenant scope

data.name: ErasureService_DataCategoriesRequired
data.value: DataCategories must be specified for Selective scope

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_AlreadyInFailoverMode
data.value: Already in failover mode. Use FailbackToPrimaryAsync to return to primary.

data.name: MultiRegionKeyProvider_NotInFailoverMode
data.value: Not in failover mode. Cannot failback.
